title: About
text:
I’m an MTech AI student at IIT Gandhinagar, where I turn real-world mess into stories that models can learn from.
I’m an active member of the Sustainability Lab led by Prof. Nipun Batra, where we work on using machine learning to build smarter, greener systems that can actually make a difference on the ground.

title: Post With Code
text: This is a post with executable code.

title: About
text:
📝 Why I Write
The best way to understand something deeply is to explain it simply. That’s why I write. Not just to teach, but to learn.









🧠 Beyond Code



Sure, LLMs can write functions.
But the real work is about the intuition, trade-offs, and aha! moments behind every decision.









🔍 Learning Out Loud



If it challenged me, it’s worth writing down.
Because someone else is probably stuck in the same place.













🧭 Not Just Tutorials



I don’t post just what works.
I post what confused me, what finally made sense, and how I got there.









🔧 From Confusion to Clarity



Each post captures: - A mental model that clicked
- A mistake that taught me more than success
- A question that made me dig deeper






🎯 My Rule of Thumb
If I had to Google it more than twice,
it deserves a permanent home — here.

title: About
text:
🎯 What I Believe






Clarity > Complexity
Great ideas don’t need jargon. If it’s complex, I try to make it simple.









Learn in Public
If I’m struggling with something, I know someone else probably is too.









Build with Intent
Good engineering starts with asking the right questions. (Btw there are no wrong questions)

title: About
text:
Sure — code, GPT can also write.
But code is just the syntax.
The real value is in the intuitions, decisions, and trade-offs behind it.
That’s the part you only understand by building, struggling, refining, and then reflecting.
This blog isn’t just a collection of tutorials — it’s a map of the mental models I’m forming as I learn.
It’s about: - Why a model works (or doesn’t), - What a result means (and how to visualize it), - And how we can think better about the systems we design.




If it took effort to learn,
then it’s worth writing down —
because someone else is probably on the same path.

That’s why I write.
My blog exists to make: - Technical concepts intuitive - Visualizations insightful - Ideas accessible

title: About
text:
📚 What I Share



🧠 Model Insights
Breakdowns of architectures, uncertainty, and learning curves

📊 Visual Stories
Heatmaps, GIFs, and interactive demos




⚙️ Tools & Tricks
Docker, Kubernetes, FastAPI, cloud hacks

🚀 Side Projects
From sensor‑placement simulators to DSA trackers

title: About
text:
🎯 Guiding Principles







Clarity > Complexity
I simplify rather than sensationalize.











Learning is for everyone
If I stumble over it, I’ll write it down.
Maybe it’ll help you at 2 A.M.











Build with purpose
Thoughtful engineering starts with understanding why.






🔗 Get in Touch

💬 Open an issue to suggest a topic

📥 Email me for collabs or questions

📣 Follow me on Twitter


Thanks for stopping by—let’s build, breathe, and learn together. 💻🌫️

title: About
text:
📚 What You’ll Find Here



🔍 Model Insights
Architectures, uncertainty, and training dynamics — broken down and explained.


🧠 Visual Stories
Animations, heatmaps, and sketches that help you “see” the concept.



⚙️ Tools in Practice
FastAPI, Docker, Kubernetes, and how I use them in real workflows.


🌱 Learning Projects
From spatial prediction experiments to personal ML tooling, where theory meets practice.

title: About
text:
🔗 Let’s Connect



🤝 Collaborate
Got an idea? Working on something cool?
I’m always open to collaborating on meaningful projects.


💡 Feedback or Questions
Confused by something I wrote?
Curious to learn more or suggest a new topic?
Reach out directly:
📧 vinayak.rana@iitgn.ac.in
🐦 LinkedIn



🐛 Found an Issue?
If something on the site is broken, unclear, or missing, please let me know!
👉 Open an issue on GitHub
I welcome suggestions, corrections, and contributions.




Thanks for stopping by.
Let’s build, breathe, and learn — together.

title: About
text:
I’m an MTech AI student at IIT Gandhinagar, where I turn real-world mess into stories that models can learn from.
I’m an active member of the Sustainability Lab led by Prof. Nipun Batra, where we work on using machine learning to build smarter, greener systems that can actually make a difference on the ground.
